remarks: Power law for the general logarithm for real powers:  The logarithm of a positive real number to the power of a real number is equal to the product of the exponent and the logarithm of the base of the power.  Property 4 of [Cohen4] p. 361.  (Contributed by AV, 9-Jun-2020.)
